net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.external

Class URLExternalAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.external.URLExternalAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, ActionListener, ExternalAction

    public class URLExternalAction
extends Object
implements ExternalAction, ActionListener
    An ExternalAction implementation that handles URL operations.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)

    • Field Summary

      The operation.
      protected Map param

      protected String target
      The target window.
      protected String url
      The URL to operate on, should not include CGI parameters.

    • Constructor Detail

      • URLExternalAction

        public URLExternalAction(String url,
                 URLExternalActionOperation operation,
                 Map param,
                 String method)
        Create a new instance.
        Parameters:
        url - The URL to operate on, should not include CGI parameters.
        operation - The operation.
        param - Any CGI parameters, a map from String to String.
        method - The request method, "GET" or "POST".

      • URLExternalAction

        public URLExternalAction(String url,
                 URLExternalActionOperation operation,
                 Map param,
                 String method,
                 String target)
        Create a new instance.
        Parameters:
        url - The URL to operate on, should not include CGI parameters.
        operation - The operation.
        param - Any CGI parameters, a map from String to String.
        method - The request method, "GET" or "POST".
        target - The target window name, some examples include "_new", "_blank", etc.
